attributes.action: Ban the testing of animals on all cosmetic products sold in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: At the moment, many people use products without giving a thought at what is happening behind the scenes. Currently, animals are being forced fed and injected, basically being sentenced to death. From birth, animals are deprived of simple rights.
attributes.background: Ban the testing of animals on cosmetic products or make restrictions tighter on the welfare of animals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

End testing on dogs and other animals for development of products for human use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736578
